name: ValidationErrors

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the ValidationError.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the ValidationError with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the ValidationErrors within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The ValidationError, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ValidationError, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ValidationError, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ValidationError, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first ValidationError in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last ValidationError in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle ValidationError in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the ValidationError with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the ValidationError that follows the desired ValidationError.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the ValidationError whose index follows the specified ValidationError in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The ValidationError whose index comes before the desired ValidationError.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any ValidationError in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every ValidationError in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ValidationError.
Returns the ValidationError with the specified index.

description: A collection of XML validation errors.
